title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A story-driven, open-world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences.

title: Elden Ring
description: A vast world where open fields with a variety of situations and huge dungeons with complex and three-dimensional designs are seamlessly connected.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: America, 1899. Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are outlaws on the run. A story of honor and loyalty in the dying Wild West.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: A young street hustler, a retired bank robber and a terrifying psychopath find themselves entangled with the criminal underworld.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash your way out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.

title: Stardew Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot. Armed with hand-me-down tools, you set out to begin your new life.

title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Experience an unwritten world. Live the unwritten in an open-world action RPG set in the 1800s wizarding world.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. The world is your canvas.

title: Portal 2
description: A mind-bending puzzle-platformer. The sequel adds co-op, new mechanics, and a deeper story.

title: Half-Life: Alyx
description: Valve’s VR return to the Half-Life series. The story of an impossible fight against a vicious alien race known as the Combine.

title: God of War
description: His vengeance against the Gods of Olympus years behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the realm of Norse Gods and monsters.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man
description: The worlds of Peter Parker and Spider-Man collide in an original action-packed story. Play as an experienced Peter Parker.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Experience Aloy’s legendary quest to unravel the mysteries of a future Earth ruled by Machines. A lush, post-apocalyptic open world.

title: DOOM Eternal
description: Hell’s armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: Task Force 141 returns with a global campaign, immersive multiplayer, and narrative-driven Special Ops.

title: Apex Legends
description: A free-to-play hero shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame & fortune.

title: Lethal Company
description: A co-op horror game about scavenging abandoned moons. Work with your crew to gather scrap for the Company.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience. This is the next chapter.

title: Phasmophobia
description: A 4-player, online co-op psychological horror where you and your team of paranormal investigators enter haunted locations.

title: Dota 2
description: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota Heroes in this free-to-play MOBA.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy. An open-world action RPG.

title: Honkai: Star Rail
description: A new HoYoverse space fantasy RPG. Embark on an epic adventure among the stars with the Astral Express.

title: Palworld
description: An open-world survival craft game about mysterious creatures called 'Pal'. Fight, farm, build, and work with Pals.

title: Helldivers 2
description: Join the Helldivers and fight for freedom with friends in a hostile galaxy in this fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Your ultimate Horizon adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant open-world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action.

title: F1 23
description: Be the last to brake in EA SPORTS F1 23, the official videogame of the 2023 FIA Formula One World Championship.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator
description: From light planes to wide-body jets, fly highly detailed and accurate aircraft in the next generation of flight simulator.

title: The Sims 4
description: Unleash your imagination and create a unique world of Sims that’s an expression of you. Now free to play.

title: Cities: Skylines II
description: Raise a city from the ground up and transform it into the thriving metropolis only you can imagine. A new scale of city builder.

title: Civilization VI
description: A turn-based strategy game in which you attempt to build an empire to stand the test of time. Become Ruler of the World.

title: Age of Empires IV
description: One of the most beloved real-time strategy games returns to glory, putting you at the center of epic historical battles.

title: Deep Rock Galactic
description: A 1-4 player co-op FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, and procedurally-generated caves.

title: Subnautica
description: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril. Craft, pilot submarines, and out-smart wildlife.

title: Outer Wilds
description: An open-world mystery about a solar system trapped in an endless time loop. The indie game of a generation.

title: Sea of Thieves
description: The essential pirate experience. Sail, fight, explore, and loot in a shared-world adventure. Live the pirate life.
